name: RTCPeerConnection.remoteDescription
description: The read-only property RTCPeerConnection.remoteDescription returns a RTCSessionDescription describing the session (which includes configuration and media information) for the remote end of the connection. If this hasn't been set yet, this is null.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCPeerConnection.remoteDescription' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
